name: The Perfect Game (Shiftyhead)
description:
You have 5 minutes to create a game. Let the correct elements pass to their containers to add to the score ,but be carefull because bugs are coming and you must not let them reach any of the containers or they will reduce your score. If they touch you it's game over.

Have a final score equal or higher than 5 to win the game. A perfect win is if you manage to get your final score to 10(you will automaticly win)
